home.registration: Register for our classes when they are available!
home.parentBrowse: Browse through programs below and then select a class with the date and time of your choice! We make sure that 100% of our participants’ demonstrated needs are met.
home.volunteerBrowse: Volunteering with SDC is simple and easy! Get started with volunteering with SDC by creating an account to volunteer and then selecting the program you want to volunteer for.
home.emptyPrograms: There are currently no programs available to register for. Come back shortly to see the programs we have to offer for the next term!

program.notEligible: Your child is not eligible for this age group. Please select a different class.
program.waitlistNotify: We'll notify you once space becomes available
program.emptyProgram: There are currently no available classes for {{program}}. Register for a waitlisted class below or check out another program

class.unregisterInfo: Are you sure you would like to unregister for {{name}}?
class.unregisterInfoAll: Are you sure you would like to unregister for all students?
class.unregisterRefundInfo: You will need to contact SDC for a refund.
class.waitlistedInfo: An email will be sent to you when a spot opens
class.emptyWaitlist: Currently you are not waitlisted in any classes. Any classes you waitlist for will show up here!
class.emptyClass: Currently you have not registered in any classes. Any classes you registered for will show up here!

account.poi_approved: Your income statement has been approved. Please be on the lookout for an email from SDC with the discount for future registrations.
account.poi_pending: Your income statement is under review.
account.poi_declined: You have been declined for low income discounts. Please contact SDC if you think this is a mistake or submit a new income statement.
account.bgc_approved: Your criminal record check has been approved. It is valid for 1 year from date of submission.
account.bgc_pending: Your criminal record check is under review.
account.bgc_expired: Your criminal record check is expired. Please submit a new criminal record check.
account.bgc_declined: Your criminal record check has been declined. Please contact SDC if you think this is a mistake or submit a new criminal record check.

upload.title: Upload Document
upload.instruction: Drag and drop your file here
upload.replace: Would you like to replace the current file?
upload.successInfo: Document was successfully sent to SDC.
upload.successHint: Keep an eye out on the status of your background check within the next few weeks.

signIn.firstTime: First time? We’ll email you a magic code to sign up instantly.
signIn.sentTitle: A verification email has been sent. Check your email!
signIn.sentInfo: To confirm your email address, click on the link in the email we sent to {{email}}.
signIn.sentHint: Didn’t get an email? Return to the Sign In page and re-enter a valid email.
signIn.successInfo: You’ve confirmed {{email}}. You’re all ready to start filling in your account information!

nav.signInNow: Sign in now to register for classes

toast.registrationFailedDesc: The class is not available for registration at this time.
toast.waitlistAddedDesc: You will receive an email when a spot opens up.

404.title: Oh no! Page not found.
404.subtitle: Sorry, but the page you are looking for does not exist. Try refreshing the page or hit the button below.
